website_summaries.verdict: Built to withstand cold, wet weather, you get top quality and the most for your money with this heated jacket. The fact that you don't have to shop for a battery is a huge plus.
pros: A warm jacket that is water and wind resistant
Includes battery kit with holster, battery, and charger
Up to 12 hours battery life on the lowest of the 3 settings
cons: Sizes runs small for some ladies

customer_reviews.title: This jacket keeps me warm in Wisconsin winters.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket lives up to the advertisement. The high setting warms up very quickly. Wisconsin winters can be brutal but this jacket kept me nice and warm. I think the sizing is accurate. I am 5’5” 128 lbs and the medium was perfect. I can wear a t-shirt with a light sweater under the jacket. It is on the heavy side without the battery because it is a warm jacket to begin with and the battery does add additional weight. All of that is acceptable to me because I stay warm. It’s not and isn’t meant to be a high style jacket, more utilitarian.
customer_reviews.author: Still looking

customer_reviews.title: Bosh heated jacket
customer_reviews.text: Severed two ski seasons, was hoping another but needed to be repaired, and the cost was just as much as the jacket, sad because I purchased the additional batteries and charges,
customer_reviews.author: geraldine

customer_reviews.title: So all in all I did really good with this years birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and so far she loves it and hasn't had any problems. She is a teacher and has been wearing it for recess duty in the morning and has been envied by the other teachers for it. Ended up having a friend give me the money to get his wife one for Christmas after she tried it out. So all in all I did really good with this years birthday gift, and a good gift is one that keeps on giving.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket!!! 3 settings heats up great. Wipe able not machine washable :(
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family member living in New England that is constantly cold. One week later received rave reviews that this has been the first jacket to provide substantial warmth without being overly bulky and cumbersome.!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 women med And got women’s large and men’s xxl
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY H. DANIELS

customer_reviews.title: Get a extra battery
customer_reviews.text: So far my wife loves this jacket. Shes cold blooded and this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph h

customer_reviews.title: Best heated jacket on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best heated jacket on the market! This jacket has kept my girlfriend warm whether its going out for the night with her girls in the dead of a snowy winter night and riding her bike around town.
customer_reviews.author: Eleazar Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: a second battery would not be a bad
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves this, only Con is the battery life. a second battery would not be a bad idea
customer_reviews.author: chris p

customer_reviews.title: Needs heated pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the coat except for the fact that the pockets don’t heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Millard

customer_reviews.title: The sizes are slighty different.. the jacket is ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are slighty different.. the jacket is supposed to be snug to heat your body so just know that when you select a size.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas A. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Works great, keeps her nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, and she loves it! Works great, keeps her nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P.

customer_reviews.title: Wife always cold?  Not anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife. She's always cold in the winter time. She LOVES it. It would be nice if they had some warming gloves to go with it. Got some extra batteries too, for those long days out in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life but great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Love the heat. Only issue is short battery life. I seem to only get an hour on high. Always needs recharging. Runs large. I take a medium and can fit a fleece jacket easily under this one.
customer_reviews.author: Majestic

customer_reviews.title: present for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife received this for her birthday and she likes to wear it in the spring and fall when the weather says you need a coat and she can turn it on if it cooks off. The battery makes a small bulge in the pocket but it is not too offensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Amazing

customer_reviews.title: The jacket was uncomfortable and the battery charger had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was uncomfortable and the battery charger had a protector on it that couldnt be removed. I had to return the jacket
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Weglarz

customer_reviews.title: Returning it.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and looks nice but didn't work. The battery was charged and it was all plugged in, as designed, but didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket. I bought a size medium.
customer_reviews.text: I bought both my adult children the milwaulkee heated jacket and they loved it so much, I was going to buy one for myself. However, when researching heated jackets, I came across the Bosch heated jacket. I decided to buy this one because reviews were positive and indicated it was a nicer everyday jacket and more form fitting. I love it after 2 days! It fits nice, it works, it is not bulky and is something I would wear a lot. For others and sizing purposes, I am 5'6" and weight around 155 pounds, 34DD, somewhat broad shoulders from weight lifting and got a women's medium.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor design for a woman
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this jacket, but unfortunately, the battery pack is too large, so I did not keep the jacket. The pack only fits in the front pocket, and creates a very large and uncomfortable bulge. The jacket is also not very slim, and the battery pack adds to the frumpiness of the design. Great concept, but needs a woman's help with the actual design.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is great. I purchased two
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is great. I purchased two. The problem is in the battery. One jacket arrived with a great battery that holds the charge and lasts. The other jackets battery is horrible! We're lucky if it will heat the jacket on high for 30 minutes. On the lowest setting I get an hour and 10 minutes. I've sent an email to Bosch Customer Service 2 months ago, still no response.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this heated jacket
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this heated jacket. High level heat is really warm and wonderful, but it kills the battery pretty quickly. Medium and low level heat offer a light heat that will keep you from freezing outside in cold weather. In church, I am often very cold and now I can use my jacket on low to be comfortable. The 12 volt battery is really bulky, but it's necessary since it's the heating element. The jacket somewhere between true to size and a little big. Don't size up because you want the jacket to be fitted so the heating elements are up against your body. Overall, a great value if you are tired of always being cold!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far the wife loves it. She likes the back heat the warm boobies! It would be nice if there were separate heat element for the hands in the pockets. It is weird that the coat instructions say to avoid rain. It is a jacket. Kind of like having a bathing suit that you can't wear bathing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I work inside - but with no heat in the winter - the cold blows right in. This jacket kept me warm (sometimes to warm) last winter! I move around a lot - and it is not bulky at all!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA C.

customer_reviews.title: item was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: item was great while it lasted, which was just over a month. half he side quit heating. very expensive to have it quit like that
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter works in hospital -long cold walk to and from car- she loves this jacket ! Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: make sure you buy another battery to keep one charging the only other issue is it isn’t Pretty my wife is willing to overlook that for the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, make sure you buy another battery to keep one charging the only other issue is it isn’t Pretty my wife is willing to overlook that for the warmth
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kasper

customer_reviews.title: The fit and arm length are great, and that's usually a difficulty for her
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but the zipper broke almost immediately. Bought a large for my mom, who's 6' tall. The fit and arm length are great, and that's usually a difficulty for her. Other than the zipper, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm, but Too Short Length of Time Charge Lasts Limits Its Usefulness
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is toasty warm with more than one level of heat. However, keeping a charge for only two hours limits its usefulness. My wife can only wear it to church and back home, before it needs to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin H.

customer_reviews.title: Battery  suck.
customer_reviews.text: Battery worked two times now it won't take a charge. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket, but the battery doesn't last long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size and quality.
customer_reviews.text: This products sizing charge is way off in the measurements. Also without a lot of pressure on the zipper, it will come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah P. Quirk

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality of this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this jacket. It keeps you warm even without the battery. Only problem is the weight of the jacket. I am 72 years old, but I bought it for the warmth and that it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.....the low setting lasts for over 8 hours!
customer_reviews.author: musikaldiana

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works completely as advertised... only draw back is the hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket, the only issue is sometimes have trouble with the on/off button
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for 40 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working 1 day after the return date. Waste of money for 40 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: SeaBass

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife and she loves it. Looks great, heats up fast and excellent build quality, as expected from Bosch. Only gripes: -The battery is a bit tight to remove from holder the first number of times until it loosens up. -Future battery design could be flat for better ergonomics but it is logical that its the same battery that is used for other Bosch products so its a tradeoff. Still a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My friend loves it as an early Christmas present. ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves it as an early Christmas present. I think she managed to get three more people to buy jackets for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. McAndrew

customer_reviews.title: It does not work.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this jacket zero stars I would be able to show my true rating. The coat warmed up the coat the first time I used it. Since then - not at all. I would absolutely not purchase this product again. Good idea - poor implementation.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size.
customer_reviews.text: The heating is the reason I ordered this but the sizing is terrible I wear a medium in all my coats and jackets, but the one is hard to zip into. I paid to much money to have to fight to get this on. but its freezing while working this year so I kept it. Milwaukee's are sized better. I should of went with them but All my power tools are Bosch. I hate to have unmatched tools.
customer_reviews.author: Sherita S.

customer_reviews.title: Question
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I purchased 2 jackets in August for my parents. I opted to send one of the jackets back due to my sister purchasing my mom one. The jacket that was exchanged was the men’s jacket vs. the women’s. Recently we noticed. The jacket has never been worn. Is there any way we can exchange for a men’s large or extra large and pay the difference?
customer_reviews.author: RYAN SALLEE

customer_reviews.title: the coat looks good and fit my wife good but charging the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: the coat looks good and fit my wife good but charging the battery is the problem. you have to get it just right to fit in then its hard to get out. after charging you have to put battery in a holder, then the holder plugs into the coat. we wonder why they didn't make the battery flat ? its like carrying a roll of half dollars on you, and good luck getting the battery out of the holder to charge it again. they should of made the holder fit into the charger. if you want a heated coat...its worth it
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. I wore it at my son's high school football game and it was perfect. Nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Erhard

product_meta.title: Bosch Women's 12-Volt Max Lithium-Ion Soft Shell Heated Jacket Kit with 2.0Ah Battery, Charger and Holster PSJ120M-102W,Medium,Black
product_meta.description: Size:Medium| Style:Jacket onlyThe Bosch PSJ120 12-Volt Max Heated Jacket is a high quality rain and wind resistant work jacket conveniently powered by the Bosch 12-Volt Max power tool battery system. Featuring three simple push-button heat settings - high, medium and low - the PSJ120 starts warming in seconds and is the perfect jobsite solution for the cold weather. Five (5) pockets, including a cell phone, large document, battery holster/controller and two hand pockets, make storage on the go quick and easy. With the included BHB120 and Bosch 12-Volt Max battery you not only can power the PSJ120, but can also power most USB port compatible personal electronics, such as cell phones, at the same time. You can have it all; warmth and back-up power. During the warm months, the BHB120 offers a convenient belt clip for use without your jacket simply as a power boost or back-up, anytime and anywhere with a Bosch 12-Volt Max battery. The PSJ120 kit includes: (1) PSJ120 12-Volt Max Heated Jacket, (1) BHB120 Battery Holster/Controller, (1) 12-Volt Battery, (1) Charger.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: The PSJ120M-102W 12V Max heated jacket is made of 100% polyester. It is both wind and rain resistant, making it the ideal heated jacket for tough outdoor jobsites.

QUICK WARMING: Featuring three quick-warming heat zones including two chest zones and one back zone, start warming in a matter of seconds. The three-level heat controller offers high heat (Red), medium (Green) and Low (Blue) for maximum control and comfort.
EXTENDED RUNTIME: With up to 6 hours of heated maximum runtime with Bosch 12-Volt Max batteries on low setting, users can stay warmer for longer without needing to recharge.
USB COMPATIBLE: The PSJ120M-102W heated jacket includes a USB charging option for most personal electronics such as cell phones while in the jacket pocket (5V/1A Max Output).
CONVENIENT: For the warmer months, The included BHB120 battery holster/controller offers a convenient belt clip for use without your jacket as a power boost or backup with a Bosch 12V Max battery.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
